summary: Public Libraries: Many Buildings Are Reported to Be in Poor Condition, with Increasing Deferred Maintenance Public libraries serve as cornerstones of many communities. But aging and outdated buildings can make it hard for libraries to meet increasing expectations to provide access to programming, technology, emergency services, and voting sites—in addition to books.
